title: Characterization of aloe vera gel incorporated unsaturated polyester resin jute-cotton fabric composites for enhanced biodegradability, flexibility, and insulation properties
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Md Anisur Rahman Dayan, Md Mahmudul Habib, Md Moslem Uddin, Mahmuda Khatun, Md Sahadat Hossain, Muhammad Abdur Rashid
